import React, {useState} from 'react' //import db from './Firebase' import { db } from 'components' export const LinkForm = () => { const initialStateValues = { name: "", username: "", email: "", clave: "", game: "", } const [values, setValues] = useState(initialStateValues); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setValues({ ...values, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // Save the data to Firestore db.collection('users') .add({ name: values.name, username: values.username, email: values.email, clave: values.clave, game: values.game, timestamp: firebase.firestore.FieldValue.serverTimestamp() }) .then(() => { console.log('Data saved successfully') // Reset the form setValues(initialStateValues) }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error adding document: ', error) }) } return (
create
face
email
lock
games
) }; export default LinkForm;
